summary: This document is a questionnaire related to the account opening for The 2017 Caterpillar Trust at Deutsche Bank. It outlines the definitions and attestations required for a family office and describes the relationship among the family members involved in the trust, specifically mentioning Jeffrey Epstein as the grantor.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is listed as the contact person for The 2017 Caterpillar Trust in the account opening questionnaire.

persons.name: Rowena Thomas
persons.context: Rowena Thomas is noted as the individual who completed the form from the Center of Excellence for the GBSA Questionnaire Preparation Team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the grantor of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust, which is a trust for retaining the grantor's annuity.

persons.name: Lesley Goff
persons.context: Lesley Goff is mentioned as one of the trustees of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

persons.name: Daphne Wallace
persons.context: Daphne Wallace is also mentioned as a trustee of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the grantor of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust, while Lesley Goff serves as a trustee of the trust.
Jeffrey Epstein is the grantor of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust, and Daphne Wallace is a trustee of the trust.
Darren Indyke is the contact person for The 2017 Caterpillar Trust as indicated in the questionnaire.
Rowena Thomas completed the form related to The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

keyFacts: The document is a questionnaire for opening an account for The 2017 Caterpillar Trust at Deutsche Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the grantor of The 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
Lesley Goff and Daphne Wallace are mentioned as trustees of the trust.
Darren Indyke is listed as the contact person for the trust.
Rowena Thomas completed the form from the Center of Excellence for the GBSA Questionnaire Preparation Team.
